item.title: About
item.description:
I am the mother of a lovely and intelligent doggy, Seleta, and the wife of a brilliant and lazy (gentle?)man, Andr√©.

I try not to take life too seriously, but I fail it over and over. I am passioned. That’s the only way I get to accomplish my stuff, personally or professionaly.

I’m always up for a discussion, for a beer, for a coffee, for a walk. I seek for special things. Projects. People. I’m eager to learn (the harder, the better). On that note, simplicity is the hardest thing ever to accomplish.

Be unconventional. Be authentic. Be happy.
